Articles.Content:
this is an awsame space plane, u can fire missiles and watch them explode

it is hard to lift off if u dont know how to.

this is how

1. throttle up to full and turn RCS on 

2. press space to start, u will notice that the plane in starting to lean back so use the RCS to counter it. (be gentle)

3. once u have cleared the launch pad, press space to get rig of the lander legs and ignite the other 2 engines to give more power

4. use RCS to pitch up if u r going down 

5. it should be easy to control from now, so enjoy and let off a few missiles

u will need these mods:

C7 (all of them)

nova puch

and the weapons mod (missiles)

enjoy

and please give feed back 

DOWNLOAD THE PICS TO GET A BETTER LOOK
